name: Merge Dice: Block Puzzle Jewel
description:
MERGE DICE: BLOCK PUZZLE JEWEL is an amazing board game. Roll the dice, match 3 same dice to merge magic dice.

*** HOW TO PLAY ***
● Rotate the dice if you want before placing it.
● Drag the gem dice block to move them.
● Match three or more dice with the same number, then the dice will be merged and you get points.
● The game will be over if there is no room to put dice.

*** HIGHLIGHT FEATURES ***
● Beautiful colorful gem dice blocks.
● Sweet sounds effects.
● Rotate & Foreseen feature.
● Powerful boosters.
● No time limit & No internet needed.
● Easy to learn with a tutorial.
● Support leaderboards.
● Totally free.

MERGE DICE: BLOCK PUZZLE JEWEL trains your analytical thinking skills as it requires real skill to set the highest score.
Are you up for it? We really hope you enjoy playing the game!
